explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a novel credit scoring model called transductive semi-supervised metric network (TSSMN), which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.semi-supervised learning: The paper formalizes reject inference as a semi-supervised binary classification problem, indicating the use of semi-supervised learning techniques.
explanations.classification: The paper addresses the problem of credit scoring as a binary classification task.
explanations.neural network: The proposed model consists of an embedding metric network (EMN) and a transductive propagation network (TPN), which are neural network modules.
explanations.deep learning: The use of neural networks and metric learning in the proposed model suggests the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.representation learning: The embedding metric network (EMN) maps samples from the original feature space to a metric space, which involves learning representations of the data.
